3OI.SG.summary: Oishi Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates Japanese restaurant in Thailand and internationally. It operates through two segments, Food and Beverage. The company also offers ramen, and snack and frozen foods; ready-to-cook and ready-to-eat products; produces and distributes green tea, fruit juice flavored drinks, herbal drinks, and drinking water; and distributes food and beverage products under the OISHI brand. In addition, it provides brand and marketing management; consulting; and food delivery services, as well as sells food online in Thailand. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Oishi Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Beverage Public Company Limited.

9AHN.SG.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. The company operates in three segments: Manufacture of Automobiles Assembly Tools and Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. It offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering, and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. The company also provides fuel lines, brake lines, engine parts, roof ditch moldings, belt line moldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

Its stores also offer clothes, beddings, leather, furniture, cosmetics, and household products; and accessories, such as shoes, bags, belt, and jewelries, as well as snacks. The company offers its products under the Inco Men, Monsieur Inco, Inco Women, Madame Inco, Cheval, Cheval Black Collection, Lady De Cheval, Cheval Kid, Sleepmate, Rollica, Prim, Cushy, and Cherish brands. GLOCON-R.BK.summary: Global Consumer Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells plastic packaging products primarily in Thailand. It offers flexible packaging products, such as roll-film rolls, enter seals, die cut bags, center seals, 3 side seals, zipper bags, and stand up zipper pouches for various types of consumer products; plastic trays and other plastic products; and polyethylene terephthalate bottles for consumer products. The company also provides rental service in shopping mall and restaurant equipment rental service; operates quick services restaurants under the A&W name; and manufactures and sells frozen foods, ready meals, and seafood and vegetable products. In addition, it is involved in the network marketing, trading, and distribution of food packaging businesses. The company was formerly known as NPPG (Thailand) Public Company Limited and changed its name to Global Consumer Public Company Limited in October 2019. Global Consumer Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

HFT-R.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. HMPRO-R.BK.summary: Home Product Center Public Company Limited operates as a home improvement retailer in Thailand and Malaysia. The company trades in a range of goods and materials for construction, addition, refurbishment, renovation, and enhancement of buildings, houses, and residences; and provides a range of related services. It also offers 3D, installation, maintenance, home makeover, warehousing, and distribution services. In addition, the company rents space. As of December 31, 2019, it had 113 branches. ICC-R.BK.summary: I.C.C. International Public Company Limited distributes consumer products in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cosmetics Toiletries & Perfumeries; Women's Apparel; and Men's Apparel. It offers tops, pants, blazers, dresses, skirts, sportswear, lingerie and night wear, maternity wear, bags, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, and other products for women; and shirts and T-shirts, trousers, jackets, sportswear, underwear, blazers and suits, bags, shoes, accessories, and other products for men. The company also provides tops, pants, skirts, underwear, bags, shoes, accessories, beds, and other products for kids and babies, as well as products for newborn. In addition, it offers leather goods, watches, home appliances, foods, soy milk mixed with corn, drinking and spring water, etc., as well as and household items, such as laundry detergent and fabric care products. Further, the company is also involved in the manufacturing of ready-made garments; and real estate activities. It sells its products through shops and department stores, as well as online channels. The company was formerly known as International Cosmetics Public company Limited and changed its name to I.C.C. International Public Company Limited in 1996. I.C.C. International Public Company Limited was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IHL-R.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, England, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, and Switzerland. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, and gear knobs, as well as lining leather and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves automotive industry. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

ILM-R.BK.long_name: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited
ILM-R.BK.summary: Index Living Mall Public Company Limited engages in the retail and wholesale of furniture, electronic, and home decorative products in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Retail of Furniture, Manufacturing of Furniture, Rental Area, and Others. It is also involved in the manufacture, import, export, and distribution of furniture and home appliances; and building and warehouse rental activities, as well as in the franchise business. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited sells its products through 36 branches, as well as online. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Index Living Mall Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Tummada Panich Family Co., Ltd.

INGRS-R.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, rain rails, glass guides, bellows, and EGR pipes and cover, as well as beltline, roof, window, and hinge mouldings; stamping products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

IRC-R.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Thunyaburi, Thailand.

JCKH-R.BK.summary: JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited operates restaurants in Thailand. The company's restaurants provide a la carte and buffet menus that offer Suki Shabu under the Hot Pot brand name; Japanese grilled food under the Daidomon brand name; and fusion food and steak under the Signature brand, as well as operates Toomato Italian Kitchen, Signor Sassi, Zheng Dou, Zheng Dou Grand, Zheng Dou express, and Bonsai restaurant. It also produces and distributes finished food and beverage products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 93 branches. The company was formerly known as Hot Pot Public Company Limited and changed its name to JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited in March 2018. JCK Hospitality Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMART-R.BK.summary: Jay Mart Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of mobile phones and related accessories in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Trading Business, Debt Collection Business, Rental Business, and Other. It also offers tablets, cameras, smart home gadgets, home appliances, smart living products, and sports and health products, as well as products for mom and kids. In addition, the company acts as the sales agent or distributor of subscriber identification module (SIM) card packages and prepaid SIM cards of mobile phone operators, including GSM, DTAC, GSM1800, and TRUE MOVE through various distribution channels. Further, it provides debt tracking, collection, and management services; car and personal loans; and finance leasing, consumer lending, insurance brokerage, and asset management services. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution of food and beverage products; and property development, e-commerce, and retail space rental businesses. Jay Mart Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KOOL-R.BK.summary: Masterkool International Public Company Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and supplies alternative cooling products to corporate, industrial, or home users under the MASTERKOOL and COOL TOP brands in Thailand and China. It offers evaporative air coolers, misting fans, centrifugal force fans, and industrial and ventilation fans; and ozone generators. The company also engages in the rental of equipment, systems, and related products, such as evaporative air coolers, high pressure systems, drink machines, air conditioners, umbrellas, tables, chairs, fog machines, and tents. In addition, it offers after sales and other services. The company serves various markets, such as animal farms, companies-factories-warehouses, events, hotels and resorts, places of worship, public transport, residences, restaurants, schools, sport arenas, and tourism places through dealers. It also exports its products to approximately 34 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Masterkool International Company Limited and changed its name to Masterkool International Public Company Limited in September 2014. Masterkool International Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KWG-R.BK.summary: King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate and non-life insurance businesses in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Real Estate Business, Rental and Service Business, and Non-Life Insurance Business. The company develops residential housing projects, including condominium units, detached houses, and land; and provides property management and agency services, advertising and marketing services, and rental and other services for its office space, It is also involved in the construction and trading activities. The company was formerly known as Keppel Thai Properties Public Company Limited and changed its name to King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited in June 2016. King Wai Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LRH-R.BK.long_name: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited
LRH-R.BK.summary: Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hotel and property development businesses. The company operates through Hotel Business, Property Development, and Office Rental segments. It operates five hotels in Laguna Phuket, including Angsana Laguna Phuket, Banyan Tree Phuket, Angsana Villas Resort Phuket, Cassia Phuket, and Laguna Holiday Club Phuket Resort; the Banyan Tree Bangkok hotel located in Bangkok; and golf clubs comprising Laguna Golf Phuket and Laguna Golf Bintan, as well as sells merchandise. The company also develops and sells properties; sells holiday club memberships; and leases land, buildings, offices, and shops. In addition, it is involved in the travel operations. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Laguna Resorts & Hotels Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Banyan Tree Holdings Limited.

M-R.BK.long_name: MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited
M-R.BK.summary: MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells foods and beverages through restaurants under the MK Restaurants trademark in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Restaurant Business and Other Businesses. It also provides training services; and manufactures and distributes foods, as well as engages in the research and development of food and beverage products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 463 MK Suki Restaurants; 198 Yayoi Japanese restaurants; 6 Hakata Japanese restaurants; 23 Miyazaki Japanese restaurants; 3 Le Siam Thai restaurants; 1 Na Siam Thai restaurant; 8 Bizzy Box shops; 1 MK Har vest dessert shop; and 3 Le Petit coffee shop and bakery. The company was formerly known as MK Restaurant Company Limited and changed its name to MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited in August 2012. MK Restaurant Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MAKRO-R.BK.summary: Siam Makro Public Company Limited operates cash and carry trade centers under the Makro name. The company operates through Cash And Carry, and Food Services segments. Its trade centers sells food and non-food products to registered members, including small and medium size businesses, retailers, caterers, professional sectors, and institutions. The company also engages in the import, export, and distribution of frozen and temperature controlled food products; provision of freight, delivery rental, and storage services; and trading of non-food products. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 134 stores, including 79 Makro Classic stores, 28 Makro Foodservice stores, 15 Eco Plus stores, 5 Makro Food Shops, and 7 Siam Frozen shops in Thailand; 1 Makro Classic and 1 Eco Plus stores in Cambodia; 3 Eco Plus stores in India under the LOTS Wholesale Solutions brand; and 1 Foodservice store in China. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Siam Makro Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Siam Makro Holdings (Thailand) Limited.

MC-R.BK.summary: MC Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and retails apparel, accessories, and lifestyle products in Thailand. The company operates through Clothing and Accessories, and Watches segments. It offers T-shirts, polo shirts, denims, and hoodies, as well as bags, belts, and activewears. The company markets its products under the Mc, Mc Lady, Mc Mini, The Blue Brothers, McT, and U-P brands. In addition, it offers skincare and aromatic products. Further, the company manages PCs and warehouse employees; and distributes products and services through online/Internet channel, as well as manages trade and products. As of September 30, 2019, the company operated a network of 640 points of sales in Thailand, as well as 12 points of sales internationally. It also offers its products online through mcshop.com. MC Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MINT-R.BK.summary: Minor International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a hospitality and leisure company in Thailand, China, Australia, and internationally. It operates through four segments: Hotel & Spa, Mixed use, Restaurant, and Retail. As of March 5, 2020, the company had approximately 2,300 restaurant outlets in approximately 26 countries under The Pizza Company, Swensen's, Sizzler, Dairy Queen, Burger King, Bonchon, Thai Express, The Coffee Club, Riverside, and Benihana brands. It also invested in, owned, and operated a portfolio of 530 hotels and serviced suites under the Anantara, AVANI, Oaks, Tivoli, NH Collection, NH Hotels, nhow, Elewana Collection, JW Marriott, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Radisson Blu, and Minor International brands in 57 countries across the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, the Indian Ocean, Europe, and the Americas. In addition, the company distributes fashion and lifestyle products under the Anello, Bodum, Bossini, Brooks Brothers, Charles & Keith, Esprit, Etam, Joseph Joseph, OVS, Radley, Scomadi, Zwilling J.A. Henckels, and Minor Smart Kids brands through approximately 485 points of sale; and provides online shopping, as well as offers contract manufacturing services. Further, it is involved in the entertainment venues and property rental and sale, food and beverage sale, supply chain management, spa, vacation club point sale, distribution, management, catering service, franchise, consulting, sales and marketing, real estate, travel agency, asset management, accommodation, and property development; and manufacture and sale of cheese and ice-cream. The company was formerly known as Royal Garden Resorts Plc. and changed its name to Minor International Public Company Limited in 2005. Minor International Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company is also involved in construction business. Its steel and wooden furniture products include cabinets, lockers, and combine furniture systems; desks and tables; chairs; partitions; safes; shelving systems; and furniture for stadiums comprising bleachers and folding stages. In addition, the company provides prefabricated building systems that consist of permanent buildings, which includes accommodation unit for oil and gas industry, mining camp, business hotel, convenience store, show, etc.; temporary building, which includes mobile office, mobile clinic, kiosk, mobile toilet, etc.; and storage building, which consists emergency shelter, telecom shelter, warehouse units, soundproof rooms, etc. Further, it offers special products, such as flood protection panel and related products, bathroom pods, smart wall systems, earthquake and seismic retrofits, bulletproof security products, and steel structure solutions, as well as building materials, such as doors, staircases, etc. It also invests in solar plants and alternative energy; and manufactures and distributes solar equipment. The company offers its products under the Lucky, Kingdom, Flowork, Okamura, Chitose, Siamsteel, ITO, and Pilot brand names. Siam Steel International Public Company Limited was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Phrapradaeng, Thailand.

SITHAI-R.BK.summary: Srithai Superware Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes household plastic ware and industrial products in Thailand and internationally. It provides various food packaging products, including in-mold labeling and food container products; beverage packaging products comprising PET bottles, closures, and preforms; rigid packaging products; automotive and motorcycle battery cases; material handling products, such as pallets, containers, and crates; garbage bins; plastic furniture products; and stadium, outdoor, auditorium, and unicorn seats, as well as lobby waiting chairs. The company also offers melamine tableware products; and mould for plastic injection. In addition, it operates a super outlet store. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SNP-R.BK.summary: S&P Syndicate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. The company operates through Domestic Restaurants and Bakery Shops, Packaged Food and Bakery Trading Business, Overseas Restaurants, and Others segments. It also produces cakes, bread, baked goods, Thai desserts, prepared frozen foods, and other bakery products; and provides home delivery, outside catering, and manufacturing service to restaurants and companies. The company sells sausage under the S&P Premo; cookies and snacks under the S&P Delio; frozen food under the S&P Quick Meal; carrageenan jelly under the S&P Jelio; and moon cake under the Golden Dragon brand names. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 529 branches in Thailand, as well as 2 franchise under the Maisen and Umenohana brands; and 18 restaurants internationally. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPA-R.BK.long_name: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited
SPA-R.BK.summary: Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides spa services. It operates through three segments: Spa Services; Sales of Spa Products and Healthy Products; and Hotel and Restaurant. The company operates RarinJinda Wellness Spa, a wellness spa; Let's Relax, a day spa service; Baan Suan Massage center; and RarinJinda Wellness Spa Resort, a boutique hotel resort, as well as operates a restaurant under the Deck 1 name in Chiang Mai city. It also manufactures and distributes spa products, such as massage and essential oils, body lotions and scrubs, liquid and bar soaps, shower gels, herbal tea, etc. under the Blooming and Siamese Wellness Secrets brand names, as well as offers spa equipment. The company operates a Thai massage school; and provides spa management and consultancy services. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 58 branches in Thailand and 5 franchised branches internationally. Siam Wellness Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPACK-R.BK.summary: S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells corrugated and duplex board packaging products in Thailand. It also engages in the offset printing business. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand. S. Pack & Print Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Oji Holdings Corporation Company Limited.

STA-R.BK.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
STA-R.BK.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures and sells ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers, as well as powdered and powdered-free latex examination gloves, escalator handrails, rubber-injection-molded goods, and high pressure hydraulic hoses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TCMC-R.BK.summary: TCM Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, distribution, and sale of various rugs and carpets in Thailand, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Flooring, Carpet and Upholstery Fabrics, and Sofa Chair. It offers Axminster and hand carpets under the Royal Thai brand; carpets for internal flooring of the vehicles; upholstery fabrics for vehicles; and carpets for the corporate sector, including offices and commercial spaces. The company also provides sofa chairs; manufactures wooden flames for sofa chair; and sells flooring products. It serves hotels, theatres, airports, houses, palaces, cruise ships, casinos, and convention centers. TCM Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company was formerly known as TFI Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited in July 2012. Thai Film Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

THIP-R.BK.summary: Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic products in Thailand. It offers a drinking straws, zipper and slider bags, general bags, cling wraps, zip profiles, and body puffs; and compostable products comprising paper and bio straws, bio zipper bags, bio shopping bags, bio t-shirt bag, and bio garbage bag on roll. The company sells its products under the Sun Products, Kitchen Neat, Fresh & Fresh, Zipsolution, Sun Bio, and Sun Mum brands. The company was formerly known as Blowtech (Thailand) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited in 1994. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand. Thantawan Industry Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Sunflower Company Limited.

TMD-R.BK.long_name: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited
TMD-R.BK.summary: Thai Metal Drum Manufacturing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes metal drums in Thailand. The company offers steel and plastic drums for the storage and transportation of lubricant oils, petrochemicals, chemicals, agriculture products, food products, and other products; polyethylene terepthalate plastic bottles and preforms; and polypropylene corrugated sheets to the drinking water and beverage companies. It is also involved in the rental of Lake Rajada office complex with a total leasing space of 51,730 square meters located in the business district on Rachadapisek road, Thailand, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNL-R.BK.summary: Thanulux Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished garments and leather products for men, women and children in Thailand. It offers shirts, T-shirts, trousers, jeans, suits, jackets, pajamas, underwear, neckties, socks, maternity wear, swimsuits, and sportswear, as well as leather goods comprising wallets, handbags, and belts. The company also provides garments for infants to 8 year-olds; and diapers, bedding, shoes, socks, dolls, and accessories for toddlers. In addition, the company manufactures and exports various other products; and manufactures uniforms, Buddhist monk triple robes, and white robes for practice of dharma under the Thammarat and Thammasorn brand, as well as green living products under the SRIDA brand. Thanulux Public Company Limited exports its products to Europe, Asia, the United States, Australia, and South Africa. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TOPP-R.BK.summary: Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic films, stickers, laminate tubes, and packaging products in Thailand. The company offers plastic films, such as POF shrink films, skin vacuum films, cast polypropylene (CPP) films, metallized films, stretch films, blown linear low density polypropylene films, CPP breathable films, films for lamination, and protection films, as well as oriented polypropylene heat sealable films. It also provides CPP peels for PP cups, such as jelly, pudding, and fruit dessert cups; and cooked rice cups, in-cup drinks, juice cups, and sterilized products, as well as for frozen food packaging, individually packaged products, and microwaveable food products. In addition, the company offers manual, semi-automatic, and automatic shrink wrapping machines for products of various shapes and sizes. Its products are used in food, cosmetic, medical product, and other consumer goods and industrial packaging industries. Thai O.P.P. Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Its products include rigid plastic packaging materials, containers, plastic-wares, and others. The company serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, homecare, personal care, and instrument sectors. Thai Plaspac Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPBI-R.BK.summary: TPBI Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes plastic bags and other types of packaging products in Thailand. It offers plastic bags, such as loop and tape handle, flat and satchel, block and bottom, die cut, SOS, and fashion bags; woven, jute, and hybrid bags; piping bags for the use in whipping up pastries, cake, and other confectioneries; vest carrier/T-shirt bags, bio-compostable bags, and fruits and vegetables bags that are used in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; garbage bags for garbage handling in trade, supermarket, and convenient stores; and LDPE zipper/food storage bags that are used in food protection, moisture, reusable, and resealable for food items. The company also manufactures multilayer blown films, including barrier films, which are used as a packaging for fresh food; lamination films for using in flexible packaging for food products; and stretch hoods and shrink films. In addition, it offers flexible packaging for frozen food, ready-to-eat food, and others in various package types; and mailing and reusable bags. Further, the company provides services for molding, cutting, and film-blowing for plastic bags; produces machines for plastic bags production; produces and distributes paper cups and bowls; and trades in paper and plastic packaging products. Additionally, it offers hygiene products, such as disposable masks, alcohol sprays, hand sanitizers, infrared forehead thermometers, and isolation medical waste bags; digital printing services; and plastic pellet compounds for production of various plastic products. TPBI Public Company Limited also exports its products to Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States, Japan, Singapore, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Plastic Bags Industries Co., Ltd. TPBI Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

TPCORP-R.BK.summary: Textile Prestige Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells non-woven fabric products used in automotive industry and other industries in Thailand. It offers non-woven fabrics for headlining interiors, truck liners, and seat back interiors; air cabin filters; sun shades made from polyester fabrics; pocket nets for seat backs; handle adjust reclining release for car seats; and rigid tapes. The company also provides health care products, including face mask, back support products, wrist and ankle support products, and caps and gowns; filters for air conditioners; high tenacity belts for the boat sail industry; seat and net bags for aircraft interiors; glue and lining fabrics; sponge shoulders pads and shapes, breasts, and fabric laminates; sport shirts; and blankets, pillow products, cloth napkins, bolsters, cushions, baby bedding sets, and cloth diapers. In addition, it is involved in the hire of works. Textile Prestige Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company offers corrugated boxed and white paper printed products in offset designs for various segments, including automotive, electric, medical appliance, food and beverage, houseware, fast-moving consumer, toy, and miscellaneous. Thai Packaging & Printing Public Company Limited was founded in 1983 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.

TR-R.BK.summary: Thai Rayon Public Company Limited manufactures and sells viscose rayon staple fiber and anhydrous sodium sulphate products in Thailand. It offers viscose rayon staple fiber that is used in textile and non-woven applications under the Birla Cellulose brand name; and anhydrous sodium sulphate for use in detergent, pulp, glass, leather, and textile industries, as well as manufactures and sells pulp. The company also exports its products. Thai Rayon Public Company Limited was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

The company also distributes its products in the United States, Canada, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.

Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.

TVD-R.BK.summary: TV Direct Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, sells goods and services through various marketing channels. It sells health and beauty products, household products, kitchen utensils, exercise products, and fashion products through the satellite and digital television, cable TV, outdoor call centers, printed media, websites, and mobile applications, as well as retail distribution through TVD shop. The company also produces and sells TV programs, and sells airtime for advertising, as well as offers data center, and life insurance brokerage and other services. As of June 30, 2020, it operated 69 distribution centers in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UP-R.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, sanitary wares, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPF-R.BK.summary: Union Pioneer Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes finished elastic products in Thailand, the United States, and internationally. The company offers rubber tapes for use in swimwear, sportwear, active wear, underwear, and innerwear; rim of pants' legs for gentlemen; medical and health care products; and furniture industry. It also provides rubber threads for use in the rims of baby and adult diaper's legs and waist; the rims of legs for gentlemen; swimming suits; and the rims of shower cap and swimming caps, as well as exercise bands. In addition, the company offers elastic braids for consumer and industrial textile applications; and elastic webbing and covering yarn products that are used as components of the underwear for gentlemen and ladies, general clothes for children and adults, warming suits, sportswear, healthy products using elastic, and tapes for flasks and bags. Further, it provides medical devices, such as Esmark and elastic bandages, as well as tourniquet for disposable or single use; and FITbands for exercise. The company offers its products under the VENUS brand name. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Union Pioneer Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Saha-Union Public Company Limited.

UT-R.BK.long_name: Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited
UT-R.BK.summary: Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes textiles in Thailand, the United Kingdom, Italy, and internationally. It offers greige fabrics made from the blend of cotton and polyester or other synthetic fiber for the production of workwear and cloth used in other industries. Union Textile Industries Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

VRANDA-R.BK.summary: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited operates hotels and resorts in Thailand. The company operates its facilities under the Veranda Resort and Spa Hua Hin Cha Am, Veranda The High Resort Chiang Mai, Sofitel so Bangkok, Veranda Resort Pattaya, and Rocky's Boutique Resort names. It is also involved in the development and rental of properties; sale of food and beverages; and provision of human resource outsourcing services. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WACOAL-R.BK.summary: Thai Wacoal Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells finished garments. The company offers ladies' lingerie under the Wacoal, WIENNA, B'me, Sgarlet, Presea, and CW-X brands; ladies' outerwear under the 5.up, RacÃ©, and WACOAL BLOUSE brands; and children wear under the ENFANT, De bon, Amusant, Little Wacoal, ELLE PETITE, and ELLE POUPON brands. It also exports its products to Japan, the United States, and the ASEAN countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures and sells ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers, as well as powdered and powdered-free latex examination gloves, escalator handrails, rubber-injection-molded goods, and high pressure hydraulic hoses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. It also offers industrial batteries. The company offers its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. It serves original and replacement equipment markets. The company also exports its products. Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.
